message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $120. This allows us both to benefit from the transaction. Looking forward to your response!
Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value you see in the product, my budget is a bit tighter than $120. I'm willing to pay $95 for it. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to accommodate you with a counteroffer of $105 for the product. This still allows us both to find a satisfactory solution. Please let me know if this works for you.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on this. $105 is still a bit out of my range.  I'm willing to go up to $100.  Let me know if that works for you.
